methods.name: public EditorBoundsInfo.Builder setEditorBounds(@Nullable RectF bounds)
methods.comment:
* Sets the bounding box of the current editor.
         *
         * @param bounds {@link RectF} in local coordinates.

methods.name: public EditorBoundsInfo.Builder setHandwritingBounds(@Nullable RectF bounds)
methods.comment:
* Sets the current editor's bounds with padding for handwriting.
         *
         * @param bounds {@link RectF} in local coordinates.

methods.name: public EditorBoundsInfo build()
